page.title: 03Wivelsfield - Clubs
page.content:
Many of the clubs and associations in the area now meet in the new Village Hall.
For the older folk there is the{Good {Companions Club,}where they can have a cup of tea and a chat.There is a {Gardening Club}and a{Flower Club}who both exhibit in the Flower Show at the annual Country Fair. For the more active there is a{Stoolball Club}which holds regular matches on the Village Green and the{Young Farmers' Club. There is also a{Brownie Pack}which was formed recently.
{Wivelsfield Young Wives}group meets once a month to listen to a talk on a variety of topics or to watch a demonstration of a craft or cookery.
